document.full_text: ivory coast's ousted strongman laurent gbagbo has been treated well, unlike his wife and son, who were beaten up after their arrest this week by opposition forces, the u.n. peacekeeping said on friday.
document.title: u.n. says ivory coast's gbagbo has been well treated
lines_and_colors: ivory coast's ousted strongman laurent gbagbo has been treated well, unlike his wife and son, who were beaten up after their arrest this week by opposition forces, the u.n. peacekeeping said on friday.
